tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Cameroon boasts rich cultural diversity with over 250 ethnic groups, each contributing unique traditions, languages, music, and vibrant festivals.

tidbits.title: Mount Cameroon
tidbits.description: Mount Cameroon, an active volcano and Africa's highest peak in the region, offers breathtaking hikes and is a significant symbol in Cameroonian folklore.

tidbits.title: Wildlife and Nature Reserves
tidbits.description: The country is home to diverse ecosystems, from savannahs to rainforests, housing wildlife in national parks like Waza National Park and Korup National Park.
